meanings.definition: A person or thing that throttles.
meanings.sent1: The throttlers in the race were determined to win.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the issue by replacing the faulty throttlers.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky throttlers tried to slow down the competition by tampering with the engines.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the villain was portrayed as a cunning throttler of progress.
meanings.sent5: The image of the throttlers working together to control the flow of power was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The team of throttlers collaborated to regulate the speed of the machine.
meanings.sent2: The factory ordered new throttlers to replace the old ones.
meanings.sent3: The group of throttlers formed a union to demand better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: The throttlers on the assembly line synchronized perfectly to maintain efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the throttlers humming in unison filled the room with a rhythmic melody.
